document_data.caption: Map of the islands of the Desert's Virtues.
document_data.name: Desert's Virtues
document_data.mainbody: The '''Desert's Virtues''' was a group of islands in the [[Great Sea]] west of the [[Genie's Turban]].

Description.The Camel's Hump: This island received its name from the lone elevation that formed a gradual peak resembling a camel's hump.
Description.The Chador: Two elevations that looked like eyeholes in a moralist's robe served as inspiration for naming this island.
Description.The Dun: Composed completely of sand, this island often served for marooning those who displeased the Captain's.  Because of this it was also known as Solitude or the Isle of Exile.
